text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe, it's gotten quite late, hasn't it. If we don't head home soon we'll miss our curfews.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Why don't we head home then?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Y-Yeah…

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hehe, Rob Roy-chan seems all tuckered out from today.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Seems like she's got a bunch on her mind.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hey, Bourbon-chan. What do you plan on doing when we get back home?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I will re-examine my plan for the Halloween party with the data that was obtained today. My tasks have also not been completed yet, so I plan to execute those as well.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ! By yourself…?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Yes… After all, these are my tasks.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Okay everyone, get a great night's sleep.

text_block_list.name: Rice & Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Good… night…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Ah, Bourbon-san! A-About the decorations for tomorrow's party. We actually managed to finish our portion today!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: You've been working super hard through the night haven't you? That's why we were wondering if we could help you out with anything…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: No, I am fine. You girls should take a break instead. Since these are my tasks they should be done alone.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: I see… But you know…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Bourbon-san, I know for a fact that you can do it. But you really shouldn't push yourself too hard. Let's all work together to make sure this party is a success!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: To put it simply, escaping from this haunted house is a mission for all of us, right…?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I have already decided that these are my tasks. Therefore, they must be completed alone.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: However… the main objective of this mission is to have a great joint dormitory Halloween party…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: But at this stage…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Even if I think I will be annoying… Even if I think it will be scary… What Rob Roy-san did for me…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: With the power… of a persona…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, but please…!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huh, Rice!? It's almost lights out, ya know!? You should get back to the Miho Dorms.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B-Bu-But! Umm, err… W-Well…!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: P-Please help me create a persona and costume!! I need it now, or else Bourbon-san will…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon-san will…!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: … Rice…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Guess I got no choice. I'll call over Fuji and Hishiama. We'll meet up in yer room.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Wait nah… You had the courage to come all the way here.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Rice, you really are a great kid, ya know? Anyways, just wait here for a bit, kay?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: … I have confirmed that Flower-san is asleep. Now I must get to work.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Remaining work… Create a proposal for the party and create the decorations that are left. First, I must make an incision in the fabric…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Welcome to the land of night… I-I am a vampire…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You will become… one of my followers…!
